resources.string:
Thanks to everyone who has donated Your support is appreciated and helps support the app.
 See http://www.cadpage.org/financial-support for more details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 Android market donations have been enabled!!!!!
 This is probably the last version of Cadpage that will not get seriously annoyed if you run over the demo expiration date. If you really don"'"t want to support us financially, this would be a good time to stop installing Cadpage updates.
 
 New Locations:
 Worcester County, MD
 Eau Claire, WI
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Montery County, CA
 Sonoma County, CA
 Brantley County, GA
 Anne Arundel COunty, MD
 Frederick County, MD
 Broome County, NY
 Suffolk County, NY
 Washington County, TN
 Franklin County, VA
 Page County, VA
 Pittsylvania, VA
 
 General Fixes
 App sometimes crashes when checking in-app billing support at startup
